column5: Welcome to your happy place - a newly renovated, well lit and furnished private bedroom with bath/shower over tub and accompanying closet area. Located in the heart of Las Colinas, a great neighborhood - quiet and surrounded by the lake. Guests from all backgrounds are most welcome here. Complimentary guest parking available. Good access to the highway - 2mins away.
column8: Luxury Private Bedroom & Bath in Las Colinas
